name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: The main (and possibly only) identifier for the coverage - often referred to as a Member Id, Certificate number, Personal Health Number or Case ID. May be constructed as the concatination of the Coverage.SubscriberID and the Coverage.dependant.

name: $addidentifier
desc: The main (and possibly only) identifier for the coverage - often referred to as a Member Id, Certificate number, Personal Health Number or Case ID. May be constructed as the concatination of the Coverage.SubscriberID and the Coverage.dependant.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The main (and possibly only) identifier for the coverage - often referred to as a Member Id, Certificate number, Personal Health Number or Case ID. May be constructed as the concatination of the Coverage.SubscriberID and the Coverage.dependant.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The status of the resource instance.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The type of coverage: social program, medical plan, accident coverage (workers compensation, auto), group health or payment by an individual or organization.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of coverage: social program, medical plan, accident coverage (workers compensation, auto), group health or payment by an individual or organization.

name: $policyHolder
desc: Returns: The party who 'owns' the insurance policy,  may be an individual, corporation or the subscriber's employer.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The party who 'owns' the insurance policy,  may be an individual, corporation or the subscriber's employer.

name: $subscriber
desc: Returns: The party who has signed-up for or 'owns' the contractual relationship to the policy or to whom the benefit of the policy for services rendered to them or their family is due.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The party who has signed-up for or 'owns' the contractual relationship to the policy or to whom the benefit of the policy for services rendered to them or their family is due.

name: $subscriberId
desc: Returns: The insurer assigned ID for the Subscriber.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The insurer assigned ID for the Subscriber.

name: $beneficiary
desc: Returns: The party who benefits from the insurance coverage., the patient when services are provided.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The party who benefits from the insurance coverage., the patient when services are provided.

name: $relationship
desc: Returns: The relationship of beneficiary (patient) to the subscriber.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The relationship of beneficiary (patient) to the subscriber.

name: $period
desc: Returns: Time period during which the coverage is in force. A missing start date indicates the start date isn't known, a missing end date means the coverage is continuing to be in force.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Time period during which the coverage is in force. A missing start date indicates the start date isn't known, a missing end date means the coverage is continuing to be in force.

name: $payor
desc: Returns: The program or plan underwriter or payor including both insurance and non-insurance agreements, such as patient-pay agreements. May provide multiple identifiers such as insurance company identifier or business identifier (BIN number).

name: $addpayor
desc: The program or plan underwriter or payor including both insurance and non-insurance agreements, such as patient-pay agreements. May provide multiple identifiers such as insurance company identifier or business identifier (BIN number).

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The program or plan underwriter or payor including both insurance and non-insurance agreements, such as patient-pay agreements. May provide multiple identifiers such as insurance company identifier or business identifier (BIN number).

name: $grouping
desc: Returns: A suite of underwrite specific classifiers, for example may be used to identify a class of coverage or employer group, Policy, Plan.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A suite of underwrite specific classifiers, for example may be used to identify a class of coverage or employer group, Policy, Plan.

name: $dependent
desc: Returns: A unique identifier for a dependent under the coverage.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A unique identifier for a dependent under the coverage.

name: $sequence
desc: Returns: An optional counter for a particular instance of the identified coverage which increments upon each renewal.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: An optional counter for a particular instance of the identified coverage which increments upon each renewal.

name: $order
desc: Returns: The order of applicability of this coverage relative to other coverages which are currently inforce. Note, there may be gaps in the numbering and this does not imply primary, secondard etc. as the specific positioning of coverages depends upon the episode of care.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The order of applicability of this coverage relative to other coverages which are currently inforce. Note, there may be gaps in the numbering and this does not imply primary, secondard etc. as the specific positioning of coverages depends upon the episode

name: $network
desc: Returns: The insurer-specific identifier for the insurer-defined network of providers to which the beneficiary may seek treatment which will be covered at the 'in-network' rate, otherwise 'out of network' terms and conditions apply.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The insurer-specific identifier for the insurer-defined network of providers to which the beneficiary may seek treatment which will be covered at the 'in-network' rate, otherwise 'out of network' terms and conditions apply.

name: $contract
desc: Returns: The policy(s) which constitute this insurance coverage.

name: $addcontract
desc: The policy(s) which constitute this insurance coverage.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The policy(s) which constitute this insurance coverage.
